body.name: 5 Tier Bookshelf Industrial Ladder Shelf Open Display Storage Rack Wood Bookcase with Metal Frame, Freestanding Storage Shelves for Home Office, Living Room, Bedroom, Kitchen
features: 🐇【Sturdy Structure and Premium Board】SpringSun bookshelf is constructed with High-temperature painting rust proof square steel tube frame and selected chipboard. Three steel tubes are fixed between each tier to keep the bookcase stable, sturdy and durable. With this good metal frame, this bookshelf has strong stability and can perfectly hold your items.

🐇【Vintage and Classic Design】Clean design meets rustic industrial style. The streamlined design is perfectly integrated with any home decoration. The open shelves can hold more things. Keep your room organized and tidy. Beautiful and practical.

🐇【Ample Space and Multipurpose】5-Tier storage shelves provide enough space for storing books, ornaments, clusters of collecting curios, potted plants, CDs and ornaments. A very popular bookcase which combines decorative and functional purposes together, suitable for living room, bedroom, office, restaurants and cafes.
🐇【Easy to Set Up】Package includes detailed instructions and all required accessories. Come with free hex wrenches. You only need 15-30minutes to assemble the table.

🐇【Size and Load Capacity】The size of the total shelf is 29x13.4x64 inches. The height between the layers is 13.2 inches. The maximum safe load of each shelf is 50 lbs. Large enough to hold anything you want. And the weight of the table is 29.41 lbs. You can move the table easily.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About Oapety Oapety is a company specializing in interior furniture products. We have devoted ourselves to the furniture industry for 10 years. Mainly engaged in tables, desks, shelves, flower rack and other kinds of furniture. We have our own R&D team and production team, has been focusing on furniture research, design and sales, always committed to promoting elegant and warm home design concept, and its professional design, excellent quality, in-depth brand concept to win the favor of the consumer. Specification: Oapety Oapety bookshelf is constructed with rust proof square steel tube frame and selected chipboard. With good metal frame, this bookshelf has strong stability.The streamlined design is integrated with any home decoration. The open shelves can hold more things. Keep your room organized and tidy. Beautiful and practical.5-Tier storage shelves provide enough space for storing books, clusters of collecting curios and ornaments. Suitable for living room, bedroom, office, restaurants and cafes. Type: 5-Tier Bookcase; Material: High-temperature painting rust proof steel tube frame and particle board; Package size: 33.7x14.3x6.1 inches; Overall dimension: 29x13.4x64 inches; Net weight: 29.41 lbs; Weight capacity: 50 Lbs of each shelf.

Easy to Set Up Package includes detailed instructions and all required accessories. Come with free hex wrenches. You only need 5-10 minutes to assemble the table. High Quality Particle Board This shelf is crafted with high quality particle board. 3/5 inch thickness of the board tabletop. Waterproof and easy to clean. Sturdy Steel Construction Constructed with rust proof square steel tube frame. This ensures the bookcase strong enough and the maximum capacity of each shelf is 50 pounds. Scratch-Resistant The leveling feet pads is made of plastic. It can protect the floor well and prevent the floor from being scratched.

Study Place this 5 tier bookcase in your study. Put your books, stationery, photo frame, toys, arts and crafts. Help you organize your books and make your study more tidy. Bathroom Place this 5 tier shelf in the bathroom. Good storage of your shower gel, shampoo, bath towel, towel and so on, farewell to the messy bathroom. Balcony Put the 5 tier shelf on the balcony, place your carefully managed plants and flowers, make your balcony more clean, beautiful and fresh.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for our home
reviews.reviewText: This shelf is perfect for our dining room.Easy to put together and sturdy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great unit for the price
reviews.reviewText: This lightweight unit came with all the parts labelled, and went together ok. Follow the instructions and don’t fully tighten any screws until all the screws are partway in. That last shelf required a little extra “give”, but it worked. The shipped box was a mess, but the pieces were well-packed inside- no damage. Shelves are just under 1/2” thick. Not sure I’d fully load it with books, but it works fine with a mix of books and other objects. Color is as pictured, a similar color to bamboo, on the beige side, not yellow. Wider than most units at this price, works great for what I wanted.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good shelves and a decent price
reviews.reviewText: This is a very nice set of shelves. I really like the simple look and it was easy to assemble. Good buy for a decent price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice stand. Looks good.
reviews.reviewText: Good looking book stand at nice (black Friday) price. Putting together was easy two person job. Just loosely tighten until fully together.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Received earlier than expected. Great price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy, easy assembly
reviews.reviewText: This was fabulous to put together with three people. We purchased two shelves, so the second one was super easy to assemble. Follow the directions exactly and do not tighten anything until it’s all assembled.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Shelf holes did not line up.
reviews.reviewText: First off, the pictures for the product state that this can hold 50 lbs per shelf, which is why I bought it. BUT the instructions said it can only hold 25 lbs.Then the last shelf holes wouldn't line up (I left everything finger loose) and when I did get it to line up, the shelf hole cracked. 0/10 do not recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Ok display shelf, horrible book shelf
reviews.reviewText: This item is exactly as described in the photos and description, but it is horrible at actually holding books. This would make a much better display shelf than bookcase.
